row.entry: Top left pile. The rest of the deck is placed here after dealing the Tableau.
Four piles top right. Aces are placed in their respective Foundation pile prior to shuffling the deck.
One card is dealt face up in each Tableau pile at the start of the game.

sect2.title: Goal
sect2.para: Move all cards to the Foundation piles.

sect2.title: Rules
sect2.para: Build any cards from the Tableau in suit and sequence on to the Foundation. Spaces are automatically filled from the Stock.
Once the eight cards in the Tableau piles cannot be played, click on the Stock to deal a card to each pile. Empty slots in the Tableau are no longer filled automatically.
Cards at the top and bottom of each Tableau pile is available for play on to the Foundation piles. There is no building on the Tableau. There is no redeal.

sect2.title: Scoring
sect2.para: Each card placed on to the Foundation piles scores one point.

sect2.title: Strategy
sect2.para: Get plenty of sleep the night before so that you are bright and alert when you play this game. Move any card you possibly can on to the Foundation piles. Have fun!
